Preheat the oven at 200ºC / 390ºF convection or 220ºC / 430ºF conventional oven.

Baking
Preheat the oven to 190 °C (convection) for 20 minutes.
Bake in the oven at 230°C, for an average of 17 minutes and adding steam.
To heat: Place the croissants on a baking tray and heat in a preheated oven (180°C, gas mark 4) for 5 minutes.
The bread was partially baked for 7 min at 250°C, in a turbo oven.
Bake in the preheated oven at 190C (fan oven on) for 6 minutes, then lower the temperature to 170C for another 10 minutes.
